home.headline: Accommodation in Sombor
home.title: Central Apartment 19
home.introText: Right in the heart of Sombor town, this delightful apartment is the perfect place to relax and explore the sights. You'll have a private entrance, a cozy living room, a fully equipped kitchen, a comfortable queen-size bed, and an extra sofa bed for two. Plus, we have a charming garden for your relaxation anytime during the day.

query.visit: Check available dates and visit us!
